name: GEO_BENE_SK
comment: AN INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) ASSIGNED SURROGATE KEY USED TO IDENTIFY A BENEFICIARYS ZIP CODE, AND ESTABLISHES UNIQUENESS OF A CLAIM. THIS IS A COMPONENT OF THE CLAIM 4 AND 5-PART KEYS USED FOR JOINING CLAIMS.

name: CLM_DT_SGNTR_SK
comment: AN INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) ASSIGNED SURROGATE KEY IDENTIFYING A DISTINCT COMBINATION OF RELATED DATES USED TO ESTABLISH UNIQUENESS OF A CLAIM. THE DISTINCT COMBINATION OF DATE GROUPINGS IS A COMPONENT OF THE CLAIM 4 AND 5-PART KEYS.

name: CLM_TYPE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE SOURCE AND TYPE OF CLAIM SUBMITTED THROUGH THE MEDICARE OR MEDICAID PROGRAM.  FOR EXAMPLE:  60 = MEDICARE  NATIONAL CLAIMS HISTORY (NCH) INPATIENT CLAIM   8900 = MEDICAID FEE FOR SERVICE DENTAL     REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_TYPE_CD

name: CLM_NUM_SK
comment: AN INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) ASSIGNED SURROGATE KEY USED TO DIFFERENTIATE CLAIMS THAT HAVE COMMON GEOGRAPHY, CLAIM DATES AND CLAIM TYPES. WHEN THE SAME COMBINATION OF GEO_BENE_SK, CLM_DT_SGNTR_SK, AND CLM_TYPE_CD IS NOT UNIQUE, THE CLM_NUM_SK IS SEQUENCED TO MAKE THE 4 AND 5 PART KEYS UNIQUE.  THIS IS A COMPONENT OF THE CLAIM 4 AND 5-PART KEYS USED FOR JOINING CLAIMS.

name: CLM_LINE_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING THE POSITION OF THE SERVICE OR ITEM ON THE CLAIM. THIS IS A COMPONENT OF THE 5-PART KEY USED FOR JOINING CLAIMS.

name: PROD_HCPCS_MDFR_SGNTR_SK
comment: NOT DEFINED, BECAUSE THIS COLUMN IS NO LONGER BEING POPULATED.

name: CLM_ALOWD_CHRG_CD
comment: NOT DEFINED, BECAUSE THIS COLUMN IS CURRENTLY NOT POPULATED IN THE IDR AND THE DATA IS NOT PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE.

name: CLM_COPAY_PD_IND
comment: INDICATES IF A COPAY WAS MADE.

name: CLM_CTGRY_SRVC_CD
comment: NOT DEFINED, BECAUSE THIS COLUMN IS CURRENTLY NOT POPULATED IN THE IDR AND THE DATA IS NOT PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE.

name: CLM_LCL_POS_CD
comment: PLACE OF SERVICE AS RECEIVED ON THE CLAIM THAT IDENTIFIES WHERE SERVICE WAS RENDERED.  THIS IS A STATE-SPECIFIC CODE.

name: CLM_LINE_ALOWD_CHRG_AMT
comment: THE MAXIMUM AMOUNT ALLOWED BY THE PLAN FOR PAYMENT. THE AMOUNT ELIGIBLE FOR PAYMENT AFTER APPLYING PRICING GUIDELINES/DISCOUNTS. USUALLY  INCLUDES COPAYMENT, COINSURANCE, DEDUCTIBLE, PENALTY, AND 3RD PARTY SAVINGS AMTS. FOR ENCTRS, MAY BE FFS EQUIVALENTS.

name: CLM_LINE_ALOWD_UNIT_QTY
comment: A QUANTITY IDENTIFYING THE NUMBER OF SERVICES ALLOWED ON A CLAIM LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_BENE_COPMT_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT INDICATING THE CO-PAYMENT A BENEFICIARY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ON A DETAIL LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_BENE_PD_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING THE PAYMENT MADE TO A BENEFICIARY FOR A DETAIL LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_BENE_PMT_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING THE PAYMENT MADE BY A BENEFICIARY FOR A DETAIL LINE OF SERVICE ON A CLAIM.  NOTE: FOR PART D, THIS AMOUNT COUNT TOWARDS A BENEFICIARYS TRUE-OUT-OF-POCKET (TROOP) COST.

name: CLM_LINE_BENE_RESP_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING THE PORTION A BENEFICIARY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ON A DETAIL LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_BLOOD_DDCTBL_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING THE BLOOD DEDUCTIBLE A BENEFICIARY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ON A DETAIL LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_CPTATD_SRVC_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING IF AN ENCOUNTER RECORD WAS CAPITATED.

name: CLM_LINE_ENCTR_PMT_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT REPRESENTING THE FEE-FOR-SERVICE (FFS) EQUIVALENT REPORTED ON AN ENCOUNTER RECORD INDICATING WHAT A CLAIM WOULD HAVE PAID IN A FFS ENVIRONMENT.

name: CLM_LINE_FFS_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING IF THE SERVICE AT THE CLAIM LINE IS A FEE-FOR SERVICE (FFS).  VALID VALUES:  Y = FEE-FOR-SERVICE  N = MANAGED CARE (ENCOUNTER)

name: CLM_LINE_FINL_ACTN_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IF A CLAIM LINE IS THE FINAL ACTION.  VALID VALUES:  Y = FINAL ACTION AND CLAIM LINE IS NOT VOIDED  N = NOT FINAL ACTION. SUBSEQUENT ADJUSTMENTS TO THE CLAIM LINE EXIST OR CLAIM LINE WAS VOIDED.

name: CLM_LINE_LTST_CLM_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING IF IT IS THE LATEST ACTION TAKEN ON THE CLAIM LINE OF SERVICE.  VALID VALUES:  Y = LATEST ACTION AND THE CLAIM LINE COULD BE A VOID  N = SUBSEQUENT ADJUSTMENTS OR RESUBMISSION TO THE CLAIM LINE EXIST.

name: CLM_LINE_MCO_PD_AMT
comment: THE AMOUNT PAID BY THE MANAGED CARE ORGANIZATION (MCO) FOR THE LINE ITEM OF THE CLAIM.

name: CLM_LINE_MDCR_COINSRNC_AMT
comment: EFFECTIVE WITH NCH VERSION H, THE BENEFICIARY COINSURANCE LIABILITY AMOUNT FOR THIS LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM.  NOTE:  BEGINNING WITH NCH WEEKLY PROCESS DATE 10/3/97 THIS FIELD WAS POPULATED WITH DATA. CLAIMS PROCESSED PRIOR TO 10/3/97 WILL CONTAIN ZEROES IN THIS FIELD. [NCH]

name: CLM_LINE_MDCR_DDCTBL_AMT
comment: (1) EFFECTIVE WITH NCH VERSION I THE AMOUNT OF CASH DEDUCTIBLE THE BENEFICIARY PAID FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE.  NOTE1:  THIS FIELD IS POPULATED FOR THOSE CLAIMS THAT ARE REQUIRED TO PROCESS THROUGH OUTPATIENT PPS PRICER.  THE TYPE OF BILLS (TOB) REQUIRED TO PROCESS THROUGH ARE: 12X, 13X, 14X (EXCEPT MARYLAND PROVIDERS, INDIAN HEALTH PROVIDERS, HOSPITALS LOCATED IN AMERICAN SAMOA, GUAM AND SAIPAN AND CRITICAL ACCESS HOSPITALS (CAH)); 76X; 75X AND 34X IF CERTAIN HCPCS ARE ON THE BILL; AND ANY OUTPATIENT TYPE OF BILL WITH A CONDITION CODE 07 AND CERTAIN HCPCS.  THESE CLAIM TYPES COULD HAVE LINES THAT ARE NOT REQUIRED TO PRICE UNDER OPPS RULES SO THOSE LINES WOULD NOT HAVE DATA IN THIS FIELD.  ADDITIONAL EXCEPTION:  VIRGIN ISLAND HOSPITALS AND HOSPITALS THAT FURNISH ONLY INPATIENT PART B SERVICES WITH DATES OF SERVICE 1/1/02 AND FORWARD.  NOTE2:  IT HAS BEEN DISCOVERED THAT THIS FIELD MAY BE POPULATED WITH DATA ON CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE PRIOR TO 7/00 (IMPLEMENTATION OF CLAIM LINE EXPANSION OPPS/HHPPS).  THE ORIGINAL UNDERSTANDING OF THE NEW REVENUE CENTER FIELDS WAS THAT DATA WOULD BE POPULATED ON CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE 7/00 AND FORWARD.  DATA HAS BEEN FOUND IN CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE PRIOR TO 7/00 BECAUSE THE STANDARD SYSTEMS HAVE PROCESSED ANY CLAIM COMING IN 7/00 AND AFTER, MEETING THE ABOVE CRITERIA, THROUGH THE OUTPATIENT CODE EDITOR (OCE) REGARDLESS OF THE DATES OF SERVICE. [NCH]  (2) THE AMOUNT OF MONEY FOR WHICH THE CARRIER HAS DETERMINED THAT THE BENEFICIARY IS LIABLE FOR THE PART B CASH DEDUCTIBLE FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM. [NCH]

name: CLM_LINE_MDCR_PMT_DT
comment: DATE OF MEDICARE PAYMENT FOR THIS LINE ITEM.

name: CLM_LINE_MDCR_XOVR_PMT_AMT
comment: THE AMOUNT PAID TO MEDICAID BY MEDICARE FOR THE LINE ITEM ON THE CROSSOVER CLAIM.  THIS FIELD IS ZERO ON NON-MEDICARE CLAIMS. [HRMZ]

name: CLM_LINE_NCVRD_CHRG_AMT
comment: THE CHARGE AMOUNT RELATED TO A REVENUE CENTER CODE FOR SERVICES THAT ARE NOT COVERED BY MEDICARE.    NOTE:  PRIOR TO NCH VERSION H THE FIELD SIZE WAS S9(7)V99 AND THE ELEMENT WAS ONLY PRESENT ON THE INPATIENT/SNF FORMAT. AS OF NCH WEEKLY PROCESS DATE 10/3/97 THIS FIELD WAS ADDED TO ALL INSTITUTIONAL CLAIM TYPES. [NCH]

name: CLM_LINE_NCVRD_PD_AMT
comment: THE NET AMOUNT PAID BY A PLAN FOR A NONCOVERED PRODUCT OR SERVICE, SUCH AS A NONCOVERED DRUG FOR PART D.

name: CLM_LINE_OTHR_TP_PD_AMT
comment: CLAIMIP- THE TOTAL AMOUNT PAID BY ALL SOURCES OTHER THAN MEDICAID, MEDICARE, AND THE RECIPIENTS PERSONAL FUNDS.

name: CLM_LINE_PRVDR_PMT_AMT
comment: (1) EFFECTIVE WITH NCH VERSION H, THE PAYMENT MADE TO THE PROVIDER FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM.  NOTE:  BEGINNING WITH NCH WEEKLY PROCESS DATE 10/3/97 THIS FIELD WAS POPULATED WITH DATA. CLAIMS PROCESSED PRIOR TO 10/3/97 WILL CONTAIN ZEROES IN THIS FIELD.[NCH]  (2) EFFECTIVE WITH VERSION I, THE AMOUNT PAID TO THE PROVIDER FOR THE SERVICES REPORTED ON THE LINE ITEM.  NOTE1:  THIS FIELD IS POPULATED FOR THOSE CLAIMS THAT ARE REQUIRED TO PROCESS THROUGH OUTPATIENT PPS PRICER.  THE TYPE OF BILLS (TOB) REQUIRED TO PROCESS THROUGH ARE: 12X, 13X, 14X (EXCEPT MARYLAND PROVIDERS, INDIAN HEALTH PROVIDERS, HOSPITALS LOCATED IN AMERICAN SAMOA, GUAM AND SAIPAN AND CRITICAL ACCESS HOSPITALS (CAH)); 76X; 75X AND 34X IF CERTAIN HCPCS ARE ON THE BILL; AND ANY OUTPATIENT TYPE OF BILL WITH A CONDITION CODE 07 AND CERTAIN HCPCS.  THESE CLAIM TYPES COULD HAVE LINES THAT ARE NOT REQUIRED TO PRICE UNDER OPPS RULES SO THOSE LINES WOULD NOT HAVE DATA IN THIS FIELD.  ADDITIONAL EXCEPTION:  VIRGIN ISLAND HOSPITALS AND HOSPITALS THAT FURNISH ONLY INPATIENT PART B SERVICES WITH DATES OF SERVICE 1/1/02 AND FORWARD.   ANAMOLY: FOR DATES OF SERVICE AUGUST 1, 2000 TO THE PRESENT, THE OPPS REVENUE CENTER FIELDS ARE BEING PROCESSED DIFFERENTLY BY FISS AND APASS (STANDARD SYSTEMS). FOR MORE INFORMATION ON OPPS DATA PROBLEMS FOR THIS TIME PERIOD SEE LIMITATIONS APPENDIX.  THE FOLLOWING IS HOW EACH SYSTEM HANDLES THIS FIELD:  FISS:  POPULATED CORRECTLY WITH PROVIDER PAYMENT AMOUNT  APASS: PROVIDER PAYMENT AMOUNT PLUS INTEREST ON 1ST REVENUE CENTER LINE (CMM WILL INSTRUCT APASS NOT TO INCLUDE INTEREST)  CURRENTLY, THE FOLLOWING FI NUMBERS ARE UNDER THE APASS SYSTEM AND ALL OTHER FI NUMBERS ARE UNDER FISS.  SEE FI_NUM TABLE OF CODES FOR ALL FI NUMBERS.  52280 -- MUTUAL OF OMAHA (UNTIL 6/1/2003)  00430 -- WASHINGTON/ALASKA (UNTIL 11/1/2003)  00310 -- NORTH CAROLINA BC (UNTIL 12/1/2003)  00370 -- RHODE ISLAND (UNTIL 2/1/2004)  00270 -- NEW HAMPSHIRE/VERMONT (UNTIL 3/1/2004)  00181 -- MAINE/MASSACHUSETTS (UNTIL 5/1/2004)  NOTE2:  IT HAS BEEN DISCOVERED THAT THIS FIELD MAY BE POPULATED WITH DATA ON CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE PRIOR TO 7/00 (IMPLEMENTATION OF CLAIM LINE EXPANSION OPPS/HHPPS).  THE ORIGINAL UNDERSTANDING OF THE NEW REVENUE CENTER FIELDS WAS THAT DATA WOULD BE POPULATED ON CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE 7/00 AND FORWARD.  DATA HAS BEEN FOUND IN CLAIMS WITH DATES OF SERVICE PRIOR TO 7/00 BECAUSE THE STANDARD SYSTEMS HAVE PROCESSED ANY CLAIM COMING IN 7/00 AND AFTER, MEETING THE ABOVE CRITERIA, THROUGH THE OUTPATIENT CODE EDITOR (OCE) REGARDLESS OF THE DATES OF SERVICE. [NCH]

name: CLM_LINE_RA_DT
comment: DATE THE REMITTANCE ADVICE (PAPER NOTICE ABOUT PAYMENT OR OTHER CLAIMS ACTIONS) WAS SENT.

name: CLM_LINE_SBMT_CHRG_AMT
comment: THE AMOUNT OF SUBMITTED CHARGES FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM. [NCH]

name: CLM_LINE_FROM_DT
comment: A DATE INDICATING THE FIRST DAY OF SERVICE FOR A LINE ITEM.

name: CLM_LINE_SRGRY_DT
comment: THE DATE ON WHICH THE SURGERY WAS PERFORMED.

name: CLM_LINE_THRU_DT
comment: THE ENDING DATE OF SERVICE FOR THE CLAIM LINE.

name: CLM_LINE_TRTMT_AUTHRZTN_CNT
comment: THE NUMBER OF PRIOR AUTHORIZATIONS FOR THIS CLAIM.

name: CLM_LINE_TRTMT_AUTHRZTN_NUM
comment: A PRE-AUTHORIZATIN/REFERRAL NUMBER ASSIGNED BY THE PAYER TO AUTHORIZE A SERVICE PRIOR TO ITS BEING PERFORMED.  REQUIRED WHERE SERVICES ON THIS CLAIM WERE PRE-AUTHORIZED OR WHERE A REFERRAL IS INVOLVED.

name: CLM_LINE_WARNT_DT
comment: THE DATE ON THE CHECK.

name: CLM_ORIG_LINE_NUM
comment: THE DETAIL LINE NUMBER FOR THE SERVICE ON THE CLAIM AS PROVIDED BY THE CLAIM PROCESSING SYSTEM.

name: CLM_PD_STUS_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE STATUS OF A CLAIM.

name: CLM_PLAN_CD
comment: NOT DEFINED, BECAUSE THIS COLUMN IS CURRENTLY NOT POPULATED IN THE IDR AND THE DATA IS NOT PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE.

name: CLM_POS_CD
comment: INDICATION OF WHERE THE SERVICE WAS PERFORMED.

name: CLNDR_CY_NUM
comment: A FOUR-DIGIT CALENDAR YEAR NUMBER (CCYY) IDENTIFYING A PERIOD BETWEEN JANUARY 1ST AND DECEMBER 31ST OF A GIVEN YEAR.

name: CLM_SRC_ID
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE, CLASSIFICATION, AND/OR SPECIALIZATION OF A PROVIDER.  FOR EXAMPLE:  207R00000X = INTERNAL MEDICINE  3416A0800X = AMBULANCE AIR TRANSPORT    REFERENCE TABLE: PRVDR_NCPDP_TXNMY_CD

name: HCPCS_1_MDFR_CD
comment: (1) A FIRST MODIFIER TO THE PROCEDURE CODE TO ENABLE A MORE SPECIFIC PROCEDURE IDENTIFICATION FOR THE CLAIM [NCH]    (2) A FIRST MODIFIER TO THE HCPCS PROCEDURE CODE TO ENABLE A MORE SPECIFIC PROCEDURE IDENTIFICATION FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM. [NCH]

name: HCPCS_2_MDFR_CD
comment: (1) A SECOND MODIFIER TO THE PROCEDURE CODE TO MAKE IT MORE SPECIFIC THAN THE FIRST MODIFIER CODE TO IDENTIFY THE PROCEDURES PERFORMED ON THE BENEFICIARY FOR THE CLAIM [NCH]  (2) A SECOND MODIFIER TO THE HCPCS PROCEDURE CODE TO MAKE IT MORE SPECIFIC THAN THE FIRST MODIFIER CODE TO IDENTIFY THE LINE ITEM PROCEDURES FOR THIS CLAIM. [NCH]

name: HCPCS_3_MDFR_CD
comment: (1) EFFECTIVE WITH NCH VERSION I, A THIRD MODIFIER TO THE PROCEDURE CODE TO MAKE  IT MORE SPECIFIC THAN THE SECOND MODIFIER CODE TO IDENTIFY THE PROCEDURES PERFORMED ON THE BENEFICIARY FOR THE CLAIM. [NCH]  (2) PRIOR TO NCH VERSION H THIS FIELD WAS NAMED: HCPCS_3RD_MDFR_CD. [NCH]

name: HCPCS_4_MDFR_CD
comment: (1) EFFECTIVE WITH VERSION I, A FOURTH MODIFIER TO THE PROCEDURE CODE TO MAKE IT MORE SPECIFIC THAN THE THIRD MODIFIER CODE TO IDENTIFY THE PROCEDURES PERFORMED ON THE BENEFICIARY FOR THE CLAIM. [NCH]  (2) PRIOR TO VERSION H THIS FIELD WAS NAMED: HCPCS_4TH_MDFR_CD. [NCH]

name: HCPCS_5_MDFR_CD
comment: EFFECTIVE WITH NCH VERSION I, A FIFTH MODIFIER TO THE PROCEDURE CODE TO MAKE IT MORE SPECIFIC THAN THE FOURTH MODIFIER CODE TO IDENTIFY THE PROCEDURES PERFORMED ON THE BENEFICIARY FOR THE CLAIM. [NCH]

name: PRCDR_1_MDFR_CD
comment: A SERIES OF  PROCEDURE CODE MODIFIERS USED WITH THE CORRESPONDING PROCEDURE CODES.  FOR EXAMPLE, SOME STATES USE MODIFIERS TO INDICATE ASSISTANCE IN SURGERY OR ANESTHESIA SERVICES.

name: PRCDR_2_MDFR_CD
comment: A SERIES OF  PROCEDURE CODE MODIFIERS USED WITH THE CORRESPONDING PROCEDURE CODES.  FOR EXAMPLE, SOME STATES USE MODIFIERS TO INDICATE ASSISTANCE IN SURGERY OR ANESTHESIA SERVICES.

name: PRCDR_3_MDFR_CD
comment: A SERIES OF  PROCEDURE CODE MODIFIERS USED WITH THE CORRESPONDING PROCEDURE CODES.  FOR EXAMPLE, SOME STATES USE MODIFIERS TO INDICATE ASSISTANCE IN SURGERY OR ANESTHESIA SERVICES.

name: PRCDR_4_MDFR_CD
comment: A SERIES OF  PROCEDURE CODE MODIFIERS USED WITH THE CORRESPONDING PROCEDURE CODES.  FOR EXAMPLE, SOME STATES USE MODIFIERS TO INDICATE ASSISTANCE IN SURGERY OR ANESTHESIA SERVICES.

name: CLM_ADJSTMT_TYPE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE OF ADJUSTMENT RECORD REPRESENTED ON A CLAIM OR ENCOUNTER.    REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_ADJSTMT_TYPE_CD

name: CLM_LINE_DCMTN_CD
comment: A CODE INDICATING THE NUMBER OF ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTS A PROVIDER HAS SUBMITTED WITH AN ELECTRONIC CLAIM.  FOR EXAMPLE:  P1 = ONE ITERATION (ONE ADDITIONAL DOCUMENT SUBMITTED)  P7 = SEVEN ITERATIONS (SEVEN ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTS SUBMITTED)

name: CLM_CNSLDTD_BLG_CD
comment: CONSOLIDATE BILLING CODE.

name: CLM_LINE_DGNS_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING AN INTERNATIONAL CLASSIFICATION OF DISEASE CLINICAL MODIFICATION, NINTH OR TENTH REVISION (ICD-9/10-CM) DIAGNOSIS.    REFERENCE TABLE: DGNS_CD

name: CLM_LINE_HCPCS_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING A HEALTHCARE COMMON PROCEDURE CODING SYSTEM (HCPCS) PROCEDURE, SUPPLY, PRODUCT, OR SERVICE PROVIDED TO A MEDICARE BENEFICIARY OR AN INDIVIDUAL ENROLLED IN PRIVATE HEALTH INSURANCE PROGRAMS.      REFERENCE TABLE: HCPCS_CD

name: CLM_LINE_IDE_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING AN INVESTIGATIONAL DEVICE EXEMPTION (IDE) FOR AN INVESTIGATION DEVICE APPROVED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION (FDA) FOR A CLINICAL TRIAL.    REFERENCE TABLE: PROD_IDE

name: CLM_LINE_NDC_CD
comment: THE NATIONAL DRUG CODE THAT IDENTIFIES SPECIFIC DRUGS.

name: CLM_LINE_REV_CTR_CD
comment: A UNIQUE IDENTIFIER OF A UNIFORM BILLING REVENUE TYPE,     THE PROVIDER-ASSIGNED REVENUE CODE FOR EACH COST CENTER FOR WHICH A SEPARATE CHARGE IS BILLED (TYPE OF ACCOMMODATION OR ANCILLARY). A COST CENTER IS A DIVISION OR UNIT WITHIN A HOSPITAL (E.G., RADIOLOGY, EMERGENCY ROOM, PATHOLOGY).  EXCEPTION: REVENUE CENTER CODE 0001 REPRESENTS THE TOTAL OF ALL REVENUE CENTERS INCLUDED ON THE CLAIM. (NCH)    EXAMPLE: 0123 = SEMI-PRIVATE 2 BED (MEDICAL OR GENERAL)-PEDIATRIC

name: CLM_PRVDR_TAX_NUM
comment: SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER OR EMPLOYEE IDENTIFICATION NUMBER OF PHYSICIAN/SUPPLIER USED TO IDENTIFY TO WHOM PAYMENT IS MADE FOR THE LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NON-INSTITUTIONAL CLAIM.

name: CLM_RNDRG_FED_PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) SPECIALTY OF A PROVIDER OR SUPPLIER.  FOR EXAMPLE:  11 = INTERNAL MEDICINE  49 = AMBULATORY SURGICAL CENTER    REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_UPIN_NUM
comment: THE RENDERING PROVIDER UPIN IDENTIFIER ON THE CLAIM.

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) OF THE PROVIDER WHO RENDERED THE SERVICE, AS PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE SYSTEM.

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_TYPE_CD
comment: THE TYPE OF PROVIDER  FURNISHING THE SERVICE FOR THIS LINE ITEM ON THE CARRIER CLAIM (NON-DMERC).

name: GEO_RNDRG_SK
comment: AN INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) ASSIGNED NUMERIC SURROGATE KEY IDENTIFYING A PARTICULAR GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION BY ITS FIVE-DIGIT ZIP CODE.

name: GEO_RNDRG_ZIP4_CD
comment: A FOUR-DIGIT ZIP CODE EXTENSION DEFINED BY THE UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE (USPS) THAT REPRESENTS A SPECIFIC DELIVERY ROUTE WITHIN A DELIVERY AREA ASSOCIATED WITH A BENEFICIARY, PROVIDER, OR CLAIM ADDRESS AND USED IN THE GEOCODING PROCESS.    REFERENCE TABLE: GEO_ZIP9_CD

name: GEO_RNDRG_SSA_STATE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING A STATE AS DEFINED BY THE SOCIAL SECURITY ADMINISTRATION (SSA) STANDARD.

name: CLM_LINE_PTB_BLOOD_DDCTBL_QTY
comment: A QUANTITY IDENTIFYING THE NUMBER OF BLOOD PINTS APPLIED TOWARD A BENEFICIARYS BLOOD DEDUCTIBLE.

name: CLM_CNTRCTR_NUM
comment: A NUMBER ASSIGNED BY CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) IDENTIFYING A MEDICARE ADMINISTRATIVE CONTRACTOR (MAC) AUTHORIZED TO PROCESS MEDICARE CLAIMS.    REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_CNTRCTR_NUM

name: CLM_FAC_FED_PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) SPECIALTY OF A PROVIDER OR SUPPLIER.  FOR EXAMPLE:  11 = INTERNAL MEDICINE  49 = AMBULATORY SURGICAL CENTER    REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_CNTY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING A COUNTY AS ASSIGNED BY THE SOCIAL SECURITY ADMINISTRATION (SSA) STANDARD. REFERENCE TABLE: GEO_SSA_CNTY_CD

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_LCLTY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING A PROVIDER'S GEOGRAPHIC LOCALITY  AS DEFINED BY CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) FOR USE IN PRICING/REIMBURSING A CLAIM. REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_CNTRCTR_LCLTY

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING A NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) UNIQUELY ASSIGNED TO A HEALTH CARE PROVIDER.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_PIN_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING A PROVIDER AS ASSIGNED BY A MEDICARE ADMINISTRATIVE CONTRACTOR (MAC).

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_PRTCPTG_CD
comment: A CODE INDICATING IF A PROVIDER IS PARTICIPATING OR ACCEPTING ASSIGNMENT FOR A CLAIM. VALID VALUES: Y = PHYSICIAN IS PARTICIPATING N = PHYSICIAN IS NOT PARTICIPATING

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_TYPE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE OF PROVIDER FURNISHING THE SERVICE ON A CLAIM. REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_PRVDR_TYPE_CD

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_PIN_NUM
comment: CARRIER-ASSIGNED IDENTIFICATION (PROFILING) NUMBER OF THE RENDERING PROVIDER

name: CLM_LINE_NDC_QTY_QLFYR_CD
comment: QUALIFIES THE TYPE OF QUANTITY APPLICABLE TO AN NDC PRESENT ON ALL INSTITUTIONAL CLAIM TYPES (INPATIENT/SNF, OUTPATIENT, HOME HEALTH AND HOSPICE.

name: CLM_RNDRG_LCL_PRVDR_ROLE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE ROLE OF A PROVIDER FOR A SERVICE BASED ON THE TYPE OF CLAIM.    REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_LCL_PRVDR_ROLE_CD

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_NSC_NUM
comment: THE NSC PROVIDER NUMBER OF THE PROVIDER/SUPPLIER PERFORMING THE PROCEDURE OR SUPPLYING THE ITEM.

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_PRTCPTG_CD
comment: INDICATION A PROVIDER IS PARTICIPATING OR ACCEPTING ASSIGNMENT FOR THIS CLAIM. [HRMZ]    CODE INDICATING WHETHER OR NOT A PROVIDER IS PARTICIPATING OR ACCEPTING ASSIGNMENT FOR THIS LINE ITEM SERVICE ON THE NONINSTITUTIONAL CLAIM. [NCH]

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_ZIP5_CD
comment: SUPPLIER ZIP CODE.

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_LCLTY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING A PROVIDER'S GEOGRAPHIC LOCALITY  AS DEFINED BY CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) FOR USE IN PRICING/REIMBURSING A CLAIM. REFERENCE TABLE: CLM_CNTRCTR_LCLTY

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_NAME
comment: A COMPLETE NAME IDENTIFYING THE REFERRING PROVIDER ON A CLAIM, A CONCATENATION OF  THE FIRST, MIDDLE, AND LAST NAME.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_OSCAR_STATE_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TWO-DIGIT NUMERIC STATE FOR AN ONLINE SURVEY CERTIFICATION AND REPORTING (OSCAR) PROVIDER. THE OSCAR NUMBER IS GENERATED AND MAINTAINED BY THE CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) AND HAS BEEN RENAMED THE CMS CERTIFICATION NUMBER (CCN).

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_OSCAR_EMER_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING IF THE ONLINE SURVEY CERTIFICATION AND REPORT SYSTEM (OSCAR) NUMBER ASSIGNED TO A FACILITY PROVIDER IS AN EMERGENCY HOSPITAL. THIS IS THE SIXTH POSITION OF THE PROVIDER NUMBER.  NOTE: THE OSCAR WAS RENAMED TO CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID (CMS) CERTIFICATION NUMBER (CCN) IN 2007 BY CMS.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_OSCAR_NUM
comment: A NUMBER ASSIGNED TO A FACILITY PROVIDER BY THE CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) VERIFYING THAT THE PROVIDER IS MEDICARE CERTIFIED AND FOR WHAT TYPES OF SERVICES .    NOTE: THE OSCAR WAS RENAMED TO CMS CERTIFICATION NUMBER (CCN) IN 2007 BY CMS.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_SNCTN_IND
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING WHETHER THE SUSPENDED CLAIM WAS BYPASSED FOR A SANCTIONED FACILITY PROVIDER. VALID VALUES: Y = SANCTION BYPASSED N = NOT BYPASSED DEFAULT = SPACES

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_TXNMY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE, CLASSIFICATION, AND/OR SPECIALIZATION OF A PROVIDER.  FOR EXAMPLE:  207R00000X = INTERNAL MEDICINE  3416A0800X = AMBULANCE AIR TRANSPORT    REFERENCE TABLE: PRVDR_NCPDP_TXNMY_CD

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_ZIP5_CD
comment: A FIVE-DIGIT ZIP CODE DEFINED BY THE UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE (USPS) THAT IDENTIFIES A DESTINATION POST OFFICE OR DELIVERY AREA ASSOCIATED WITH A BENEFICIARY, PROVIDER, OR CLAIM ADDRESS.    REFERENCE TABLE: GEO_ZIP5_CD

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_ZIP4_CD
comment: A FOUR-DIGIT ZIP CODE EXTENSION DEFINED BY THE UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE (USPS) THAT REPRESENTS A SPECIFIC DELIVERY ROUTE WITHIN A DELIVERY AREA ASSOCIATED WITH A BENEFICIARY, PROVIDER, OR CLAIM ADDRESS.    REFERENCE TABLE: GEO_ZIP9_CD

name: GEO_FAC_SK
comment: AN INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) ASSIGNED NUMERIC SURROGATE KEY IDENTIFYING A PARTICULAR GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION BY ITS FIVE-DIGIT ZIP CODE.

name: CLM_LINE_CHK_DT
comment: A DATE IDENTIFYING WHEN A CHECK IS GENERATED FOR A CLAIM LINE ITEM.

name: CLM_DGNS_PRCDR_ICD_IND
comment: INDICATOR TO SHOW IF IT IS ICD9 OR ICD10

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_GRP_NPI_NUM
comment: CARRIER LINE PERFORMING GROUP NPI NUMBER

name: CLM_RNDRG_PRVDR_TAX_NUM
comment: LINE PROVIDER TAX NUMBER

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_OSCAR_FAC_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE ONLINE SURVEY CERTIFICATION AND REPORT SYSTEM (OSCAR) TYPE OF FACILITY FOR A FACILITY PROVIDER. THIS IS POSITIONS 3-5 OF THE PROVIDER NUMBER.  NOTE: THE OSCAR WAS RENAMED TO CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID (CMS) CERTIFICATION NUMBER (CCN) IN 2007 BY CMS.

name: CLM_LINE_RX_NUM
comment: THE PHARMACYS INTERNAL INVOICE NUMBER ON PHARMACEUTICAL CLAIMS.

name: CLM_LINE_PMD_UNIQ_TRKNG_NUM
comment: A UNIQUE TRACKING NUMBER (UTN) ASSIGNED TO EACH POWER MOBILITY DEVICE (PMD) PRIOR AUTHORIZATION (PA) REQUEST.

name: CLM_LINE_RNDRG_PRVDR_TXNMY_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE TYPE, CLASSIFICATION, AND/OR SPECIALIZATION OF A PROVIDER.  FOR EXAMPLE:  207R00000X = INTERNAL MEDICINE  3416A0800X = AMBULANCE AIR TRANSPORT    REFERENCE TABLE: PRVDR_NCPDP_TXNMY_CD

name: CLM_LINE_NDC_QTY
comment: THE QUANTITY OF AN NDC APPLICABLE TO INSTITUTIONAL CLAIMS.

name: CLM_LINE_SRVC_UNIT_QTY
comment: THE TOTAL UNITS BILLED FOR A REVENUE CENTER CLAIM LINE.

name: CLM_LINE_OTAF_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING A PROVIDER'S OBLIGATED TO ACCEPT IN FULL (OTAF) FROM MEDICARE AS PAYMENT. A BENEFICIARY CANNOT BE CHARGED FOR ANY AMOUNT EXCEEDING THE OTAF TOTAL.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_TAX_NUM
comment: A NUMBER ASSIGNED TO THE PROVIDER BY THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT FOR TAX REPORTING PURPOSES.  IT IS ALSO KNOWN AS A TAX IDENTIFICATION NUMBER (TIN) OR AN EMPLOYER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER (EIN).

name: PRVDR_RNDRNG_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) OF THE PROVIDER WHO RENDERED THE SERVICE, AS SOURCED FROM THE NATIONAL PLAN AND PROVIDER ENUMERATION SYSTEM (NPPES).    NOTE: THIS COLUMN IS POPULATED IF THE RENDERING PROVIDER NPI ON THE CLAIM, AS PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE SYSTEM, CAN BE FOUND IN THE INTEGRATED DEPOSIT REPOSITORY (IDR) PROVIDER DATA AS SOURCED FROM NPPES.

name: PRVDR_RNDRNG_PRVDR_GRP_NPI_NUM
comment: THE HIPAA ADMINISTRATIVE SIMPLIFICATION STANDARD UNIQUE HEALTH IDENTIFIER FOR A HEALTH CARE PROVIDER. THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFER (NPI) OF THE RENDERING GROUP PROVIDER ASSOCIATED WITH THE CLAIM.  THIS COLUMN IS POPULATED FROM THE NPI CROSSWALK REFERENCE INFORMATION PROVIDED BY NPESS

name: PRVDR_FAC_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING A NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) UNIQUELY ASSIGNED TO A HEALTH CARE PROVIDER.    NOTE: THIS COLUMN IS POPULATED IF THE NPI ON THE CLAIM, AS PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE SYSTEM, CAN BE FOUND IN THE INTEGRATED DEPOSIT REPOSITORY (IDR) PROVIDER DATA.

name: CLM_LINE_FPS_MODEL_NUM
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE LINE LEVEL MODEL NUMBER SUBMITTED BY THE FRAUD PREVENTION SYSTEM (FPS).

name: CLM_LINE_FPS_MSN_1_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE MEDICARE SUMMARY NOTICE (MSN) GENERATED TO A BENEFICIARY EXPLAINING CLAIM DECISIONS AND INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE FRAUD PREVENTION SYSTEM (FPS). FOR EXAMPLE: 15.21 15.4 99.96. THERE CAN BE UP TO TWO MSN CODES PROVIDED BY FPS FOR A CLAIM LINE. THIS IS 1 OF 2 OCCURRENCES.

name: CLM_LINE_FPS_MSN_2_CD
comment: A CODE IDENTIFYING THE MEDICARE SUMMARY NOTICE (MSN) GENERATED TO A BENEFICIARY EXPLAINING CLAIM DECISIONS AND INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE FRAUD PREVENTION SYSTEM (FPS). FOR EXAMPLE: 15.21 15.4 99.96. THERE CAN BE UP TO TWO MSN CODES PROVIDED BY FPS FOR A CLAIM LINE. THIS IS 2 OF 2 OCCURRENCES.

name: CLM_LINE_CVRD_PD_AMT
comment: AN AMOUNT IDENTIFYING THE MEDICARE PAYMENT FOR A LINE ITEM SERVICE.

name: CLM_UNIQ_ID
comment: AN IDR ASSIGNED SURROGATE KEY USED TO  IDENTIFY A CLAIM.

name: CLM_LINE_SRVC_UOM_CD
comment: A CODE THAT IDENTIFIES A UNIT OF MEASUREMENT (I.E. UNT=UNITS, MTS=MINUTES, DAY=DAYS) ON A CLAIM LINE. [ENCTR]

name: CLM_LINE_PD_SRVC_UNIT_QTY
comment: THE COUNT OF THE NUMBER OF SERVICE UNITS PAID ON A CLAIM LINE.

name: CLM_LINE_RFRL_TXT
comment: A VALUE IDENTIFYING A REFERRAL ASSIGNED BY THE PAYER OR OTHER SERVICE ORGANIZATION.

name: CLM_LINE_CHK_NUM
comment: (1) CHECK NUMBER OF THE CHECK MAILED TO THE PROVIDER.  THIS IS THE NUMBER THAT IS PRINTED ON THE CHECK.  (2) IDENTIFIES ID ASSIGNED BY SENDER TO REFERENCE INDIVIDUAL PHARMACY AND MEMBER REIMBURSEMENT. CHECK OR EFT TRACE NUMBER. [NCPDP 287]

name: CLM_LINE_BENE_PYMT_DDCTBL_AMT
comment: AMOUNT TO BE COLLECTED FROM A PATIENT THAT IS INCLUDED IN  PATIENT PAY AMOUNT  (505-F5) THAT IS APPLIED TO A PERIODIC DEDUCTIBLE. [NCPDP 517-FH]

name: CLM_LINE_ANSTHSA_UNIT_CNT
comment: A QUANTITY IDENTIFYING THE NUMBER OF SERVICES BILLED FOR AN ANESTHESIA SERVICE ON A CLAIM LINE OF SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_BILD_UNIT_QTY
comment: A VALUE IDENTIFYING THE QUANTITY BILLED ON THE CLAIM LINE FOR A SERVICE.

name: CLM_LINE_FAC_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) OF THE FACILITY PROVIDER ON THE CLAIM, AS PROVIDED BY THE SOURCE SYSTEM.

name: CLM_LINE_MSP_RSDL_PYMT_RVW_SW
comment: AN INDICATOR IDENTIFYING HOW MEDICARE SHOULD PROCESS A CLAIM RELATED TO A WORKERS' COMPENSATION MEDICARE SET-ASIDE ARRANGEMENT (WCMSA) OR AN ONGOING RESPONSIBILITY FOR MEDICALS (ORM) PROGRAM.  X – ALLOW SECONDARY PAYMENT  SPACE – NO SECONDARY PAYMENT

name: CLM_FROM_DT
comment: A DATE IDENTIFYING THE FIRST DAY SERVICES ARE PROVIDED TO A BENEFICIARY.

name: CLM_LINE_MDPP_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMERIC VALUE INDICATING THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) OF THE MEDICARE DIABETES PREVENTION PROGRAM (MDPP) PROVIDER ON THE CLAIM.

name: CLM_LINE_ORDRG_PRVDR_NPI_NUM
comment: A NUMBER IDENTIFYING THE NATIONAL PROVIDER IDENTIFIER (NPI) OF A PROVIDER ORDERING TESTS, EQUIPMENT, OR SUPPLIES.

name: CLM_FAC_PRVDR_FULL_CCN_NUM
comment: A UNIQUE NUMBER ASSIGNED TO THE INSTITUTIONAL PROVIDER BY THE CENTERS FOR MEDICARE AND MEDICAID SERVICES (CMS) TO IDENTIFY EACH SEPARATELY CERTIFIED MEDICARE PART A PROVIDER.  NOTE: THIS IS A FULL CMS CERTIFICATION NUMBER (CCN) THAT ALLOWS FOR THE IDENTIFICATION OF MULTIPLE CAMPUS HOSPITALS. FOR MULTI-CAMPUS HOSPITALS, ALL CAMPUSES CONTAIN THE SAME FIRST 6-DIGIT CCN, BUT POSITIONS 7-13 MAY BE USED TO DISTINGUISH BETWEEN CAMPUSES.

name: META_SK
comment: A UNIQUE LEGACY NUMERIC VALUE ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR), FORMULATED WITH A DATE AND A 3-DIGIT SEQUENCE NUMBER, WHICH IDENTIFIES THE BATCH PROCESS THAT INITIALLY LOADED A ROW IN THE IDR. DUE TO THE LIMITATION OF A 3-DIGIT VALUE, THIS IS BEING REPLACED BY META_SRC_PRCSG_ID ON NEW IDR TABLES AS THE SOURCE DATA TRACKING STANDARD.

name: META_SRC_SK
comment: A UNIQUE NUMERIC VALUE ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) USED TO IDENTIFY THE SPECIFIC SOURCE OF THE DATA WHEN A ROW IS LOADED INTO THE IDR.    REFERENCE TABLE: V2_MDCR_META_DCTNRY_SRC

name: META_LST_UPDT_SK
comment: A UNIQUE LEGACY NUMERIC VALUE ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR), FORMULATED WITH A DATE AND 3-DIGIT SEQUENCE NUMBER, WHICH IDENTIFIES THE BATCH PROCESS THAT UPDATED A ROW IN THE IDR. DUE TO THE LIMITATION OF A 3-DIGIT VALUE, THIS IS BEING REPLACED BY META_LTST_SRC_PRCSG_ID ON NEW IDR TABLES AS THE SOURCE DATA TRACKING STANDARD.

name: META_LST_UPDT_SRC_SK
comment: A UNIQUE NUMERIC VALUE ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) USED TO IDENTIFY THE SPECIFIC SOURCE OF THE DATA WHEN A ROW IS UPDATED IN THE IDR.

name: META_SRC_PRCSG_ID
comment: A VALUE ASSIGNED BASED ON A BATCH IDENTIFICATION IN ORDER TO TRACE IT BACK TO ITS ORIGINAL SOURCE. IT WILL ONLY BE POPULATED WHEN A RECORD IS INSERTED.

name: META_LTST_SRC_PRCSG_ID
comment: A VALUE ASSIGNED BASED ON A BATCH IDENTIFICATION IN ORDER TO TRACE IT BACK TO ITS ORIGINAL SOURCE. IT WILL ONLY BE POPULATED WHEN A RECORD IS SUBSEQUENTLY UPDATED.

name: IDR_INSRT_TS
comment: THE SYSTEM DATE AND TIME ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) WHILE PERFORMING AN INSERT OPERATION.

name: IDR_UPDT_TS
comment: THE SYSTEM DATE AND TIME ASSIGNED BY THE INTEGRATED DATA REPOSITORY (IDR) WHEN UPDATES ARE MADE TO ANY NON-PRIMARY KEY COLUMN.
